defer.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to delay something until a later date
defer.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: Further discussion on the proposal will be deferred until April.
defer.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to delay something until a later time or date
defer.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: The president may defer decisions on future defense spending cuts.
Further discussion on the proposal will be deferred until April.
